story_21_06000/2401_1001_0100_10:
I didn’t think we would get matched up with
Marshal and his team so quickly.
story_21_06000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Yeah, not only was their coordination
impeccable...but they looked like they were
having a lot of fun during that battle, too!
story_21_06000/2401_1001_0300_10:
To think our first opponents were that strong...
Goes to show you that the finals are no joke!
story_21_06000/2401_0401_0500_10:
I know what you mean! I can’t wait to see all the
other teams!
story_21_06000/2401_0302_0600_10:
Our teamwork makes us just as good
as any of these other teams!
story_21_06000/2401_0402_0700_10:
You bet! That’s why we we’ve been able to
beat the competition up to now!
story_21_06000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Ha ha! If that’s your first reaction after battling,
we’ll be fine!
story_21_06000/2401_1101_0900_20:
Attention, all sync pairs:
Round one of the finals has ended.
story_21_06000/2401_1101_1000_20:
The matchups for round two will be
announced momentarily.
story_21_06000/2401_1001_1100_10:
It’s already time to announce the next matches!
Let’s see. Our new opponents are...
